Reviews.Title: Tripod broken
Reviews.Author: Thomas Jung
Reviews.Content: The tripod was broken when we first got it, but other than that all the equipment came in fine form.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, user friendly and outstanding pictures.
Reviews.Author: Charliebird "Charliebird"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a friend and he used it on vacation in Hawaii.  It took awesome pictures.  He is not one to read the manual first but was able to use the camera without much trouble.  This camera will do so much, it is well worth the investment.
